extendedInfo.description: Qualitative and convenient  for application of HD Wallpaper for Android. Here you will find more than 50 000 qualitative wallpapers specially chosen for the Android. You can choose wallpapers for the mood, tricks, friends, a family and relatives. Wallpapers are sorted on category (39 categories), so you can easily find what you want. With HD Wallpaper for Android you can easily conveniently   establish liked wallpaper.The advantages of the application:-The application is available for everyone and it's free-The quality and speed of loading-The database is updated every day-The division into categories-Quick Search-The base-over 50 000 wallpaper-Wallpapers specially chosen for the Android-Possibility to save the wallpaper-SlideshowWhy should you pay for application if you can download it free? In function and quality of our application is not inferior to pay.Even if you can not choose all of the proposed wallpapers for you, the button "Random" will help you. You can also choose the background color when you are viewing the wallpaper . It is impossible not to see the slideshow, which is beautifully prodemontriruet wallpaper in the selected category.Categories:3D graphics,  Abstraction,  Aircraft, Auto, Anime, Helicopters, Glamour, Cities, Girls, Children, Food, Animals, Sunsets, Games, Ships, Computers, Space, Cats, Creative, Love, Macro, Motor, Men,  Music,  Cartoons, Drinks,  Moods,  Holidays,  Funny,  Nature, Beach,  Rendering, Airplanes, Dogs, Sport, Textures

reviews.title: Stunning
reviews.comment: This app has thee most stunning wallpapers. The photos etc. Look like something out of a high end magazine. Perfect !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Stunning app! Really cool pictures. And I really like feature that you can save pictures and put them as a lockscreen picture. Love this app. :-)
reviews.author: Arthur Birzgalis

reviews.title: One star
reviews.comment: If this actually worked I would give it 5 stars. When I touch set as wallpaper it doesn\'t do it & if I download an image it shows up as a blank so uninstalling.
reviews.author: marylou peavey

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: This has the best of quality wallpapers and wide variety. Very easy to use interface and smart categorisation. Super impressed.
reviews.author: unnikrishnan sashidharan

reviews.title: Love it but....
reviews.comment: I dont wanna go over each picture to see them, i need a thumbnails so i can choose the one i like, its boring to search picture by picture, please do a thumbnails view, and make a section for new pictures and keep add new pix...lets say every week.
reviews.author: Maen Khatib

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This app have beautifully and cool wallpapers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 1star 4 charity lmao!!
reviews.comment: This app is a joke Omg everyone was right its a catastrophy!! Tap n wait for a pic if it shows up its random takes forever n sometimes goes blank bfore u can save to a folder - who\'s the momo that created this? It makes the bad apps look like a prize- it\'s by far thee worse - uninstalling.
reviews.author: April Mancuso

reviews.title: save !
reviews.comment: i WANT a feature so i can save the pics in my sdcard so i can use them on my pc too :( btw great app , i\'ll rate 5stars if u add this feature :)
reviews.author: AmirAli Jahromizadeh

reviews.title: Great pictures.
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to figure out how to set a photo for the lock screen too. If I could would be 5 star.
reviews.author: Kevin Pattison

reviews.title: Beautiful pictures, but..
reviews.comment: Don\'t expect to get to use them for contact pictures even though some of them remind you of places you\'ve been or somewhere your contact would love... Uninstalled
reviews.author: Kimberly Mc Gowan

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe this had as good as reviews as it does. The quality is not HD. S4 user and the pictures look terrible.
reviews.author: Beca Hagemann

reviews.title: gr8 app
reviews.comment: this app gives us variety of hd wallpaper wid difrnt categories, awesum clearty guys.. we cn save difrnt walpaprs also . . i hv saved manier hd walpapers frm dis app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t download image bug.
reviews.comment: I\'ve emailed developer several weeks ago and no reply or update, good quality images though.
reviews.author: keevan weissenberg

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Have used many wallpapers from this app over the last few weeks. Thought it was only fair that I come and give it five stars
reviews.author: Glen Mason

reviews.title: Haha
reviews.comment: You spelled saving wrong when you save it to your device. You spelled it like \"saveing\" LOL
reviews.author: Shaun McFadden

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Just wondering where the other races are in the children and glamour section. Also, the word \"saving\" is spelled without an \"e.\" Just thought you should know that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best choice
reviews.comment: I  totally love it.  it is very good high definition wallpapers. this application let\'s you choose from a wide variety of sorted pictures. A 6 star definitely
reviews.author: Martin Kerkhofs

reviews.title: xD
reviews.comment: Every word in this app is misspelled, which \342\200\224always\342\200\224 makes me second think on downloading the app when the maker can\'t spell \'yes\'
reviews.author: Jeffery Daniel

reviews.title: Don\'t buy this.
reviews.comment: It worked fine for less than a week now it repeatedly crashes.  The pro size change does NOTHING
reviews.author: James Bond

reviews.title: Can\'t download
reviews.comment: I can\'t install it, whenever I do it says \"error downloading\". I would give it a higher rating if it works but for now, just one datr is more than enough.
reviews.author: Katrina Gallardo
